title: [$500]  Personal details - App crashed when tap on Home address page

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

comments.body:
:wave: Friendly reminder that deploy blockers are time-sensitive ⏱ issues! [Check out the open `StagingDeployCash` deploy checklist](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3AStagingDeployCash) to see the list of PRs included in this release, then work quickly to do one of the following:
  1. Identify the pull request that introduced this issue and revert it.
  2. Find someone who can quickly fix the issue.
  3. Fix the issue yourself.
Triggered auto assignment to @thienlnam (`Engineering`), see https://stackoverflow.com/c/expensify/questions/4319 for more details.

Found the PR that caused the regression: https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/29742

https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/29742#issuecomment-1797872073

I'm available to fix this issue immediately
cc @thienlnam 

## Proposal

### Please re-state the problem that we are trying to solve in this issue.
App crashes when tapping on Home address page

### What is the root cause of that problem?
The root cause lies in this line:
https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/040c8a76ed881307f0f6eeb9d71f2ce82aea289d/src/pages/settings/Profile/PersonalDetails/AddressPage.js#L215

Since this does not have the parameters, `undefined` is used when trying to destructure parameters, causing the fatal crash.

### What changes do you think we should make in order to solve the problem?
<!-- DO NOT POST CODE DIFFS -->
TO fix this, we can change the line to `accessibilityLabel={translate('common.addressLine', {lineNumber: 2})}`

### What alternative solutions did you explore? (Optional)
remove `accessibilityLabel`
Sounds great - looks like that fixes it. Will assign ya
[PR](https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/30959) is up, please help review @thienlnam! Could you also please add the `External` tag so Melv can assign a C+?
Maybe @getusha can take this as C+ as it came from [PR](https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/29742) he reviewed.
This is pretty straightforward so going to review it myself - also I wouldn't say this is a regression actually - it's more a feature that was caught by typescript
Triggered auto assignment to Contributor-plus team member for initial proposal review - @aimane-chnaif (`External`)

📣 @GItGudRatio 🎉 An offer has been automatically sent to your Upwork account for the Contributor role 🎉 Thanks for contributing to the Expensify app!

[Offer link](https://www.upwork.com/nx/wm/offer/27554474)
[Upwork job](https://www.upwork.com/jobs/~010ad9a28a992c9851) 
Please accept the offer and leave a comment on the Github issue letting us know when we can expect a PR to be ready for review 🧑‍💻
Keep in mind: [Code of Conduct](https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md) | [Contributing](https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) 📖
@thienlnam, @GItGudRatio Whoops! This issue is 2 days overdue. Let's get this updated quick!
Triggered auto assignment to @dylanexpensify (`Bug`), see https://stackoverflow.com/c/expensify/questions/14418 for more details.

### Bug0 Triage Checklist ([Main S/O](https://stackoverflowteams.com/c/expensify/questions/14418))

- [ ] This "bug" occurs on a supported platform (ensure `Platforms` in OP are ✅)
- [ ] This bug is not a duplicate report (check [E/App issues](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues) and [#expensify-bugs](https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C049HHMV9SM))
    - If it is, comment with a link to the original report, close the issue and add any novel details to the original issue instead
- [ ] This bug is reproducible using the reproduction steps in the OP. [S/O](https://stackoverflowteams.com/c/expensify/questions/14418#:~:text=The%20bug%20is%20reproducible)
    - If the reproduction steps are clear and you're unable to reproduce the bug, check with the reporter and QA first, then close the issue.
    - If the reproduction steps aren't clear and you determine the correct steps, please update the OP.
- [ ] This issue is filled out as thoroughly and clearly as possible
    - Pay special attention to the title, results, platforms where the bug occurs, and if the bug happens on staging/production.
- [ ] I have reviewed and subscribed to the linked Slack conversation to ensure Slack/Github stay in sync

cc @dylanexpensify 

This has been fixed and is ready to pay out- we just need to pay @GItGudRatio for fixing the issue (no C+ payment needed for this since I did the review myself)
Nice! Paying today! @GItGudRatio did you apply in Upwork?
@dylanexpensify Hi, yes, have already accepted the offer.

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 1.3.96.0 **Reproducible in staging?:** y **Reproducible in production?:** n **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from TestRail:** **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** **Logs:** https://stackoverflow.com/c/expensify/questions/4856 **Expensify/Expensify Issue URL:** **Issue reported by:** Applause - Internal Team **Slack conversation:** ## Action Performed: 1. Launch App 2. Tap on Settings > Profile > Personal details 3. Tap on address ## Expected Result: Address page should be open. ## Actual Result: App crashed when tapping on Home address page. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: Which of our officially supported platforms is this issue occurring on? - [x] Android: Native - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: Native - [x] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [x] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/Expensify/App/assets/93399543/3ba26d83-f619-4713-bcb5-f2ecca5db3e1 ![](https://utest-dl.s3.amazonaws.com/12102/26469/436732/6266745/bugAttachment/Bug6266745_1699322553833%21777.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Date=20231107T021007Z&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Expires=86400&X-Amz-Credential=AKIAJ2UIWMJ2OMC3UCQQ%2F20231107%2Fus-east-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Signature=fdd345d67eee380b56781afb879ca2f51713aa6bcccb9a8fe112a3a089cb744a) ![](https://utest-dl.s3.amazonaws.com/12102/26469/436732/6266745/bugAttachment/Bug6266745_1699322553841%21Julia_iPhone_crash_iOS.txt?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Date=20231107T021043Z&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Expires=86400&X-Amz-Credential=AKIAJ2UIWMJ2OMC3UCQQ%2F20231107%2Fus-east-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Signature=1c82ad88249b4caf3ddaeded2f04cf058afbe975af59c173f6ec3add75d06902) [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
